version_description: In this version, the images have an even better quality!

The PlayKids Inc. is growing really quickly, and in this version we have created an easy way to experience the magic of our new apps: Stories and Talk.

Also, we add a radical minigame: the Half Pipe! The children will be able to play with Junior & friends in the skate ramp. =)

Our Party is even more fun!
There are new levels and challenges waiting for you. Can you beat all of them?
Update the app and come play with us!

Our Party is even more fun!
There are new levels and challenges waiting for you. Can you beat all of them?
Update the app and come play with us!

Prepare yourself! There are a lot of great stuff on PlayKids Party! The Toy Helicopter Ride is with new levels and beautiful scenarios! Can you overcome all these challenges?

Besides, the Junior's closet has much more clothes and new accessories!

Update the app and come play with us!

Junior and his friends worked hard to make the party even more fun. Just open the app to discover a lot of great stuff that we prepare for you!

Now there are more clothes and costumes to garnish you character and make it even more beautiful. Also, the Toy Helicopter Ride is avaiable to all users. Even if you aren't a PlayKids subscriber you can try the new levels and surprises on this amazing game. Can you overcome all these challenges?

Update PlayKids Party and come play with us!

We worked very hard during the last weeks to make a party even more fun! PlayKids Party is lighter and faster! And there are more good news! The characters' closet has a lot of new clothes.

Update PlayKids Party and come play with us!

We worked very hard during the last weeks to make a party even more fun! PlayKids Party is lighter and faster! And there are more good news! The characters' closet has a lot of new clothes.

Update PlayKids Party and come play with us!

Kids had a lot of fun on PlayKids Party with the piñatas party. Now they will have many more reasons to enjoy playing as we’ll introduce a dinosaur party for them to explore with new games to play!

ROOOAR! Now we have dinosaurs!
Let’s explore the jurassic party. Fly around in a pterodactyl, play in the tree house, slip by a dinosaur's neck and, of course, find and play two new games.
